title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 115 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 115 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Not unto us, O LORD, not unto us, but unto thy name give glory, for thy mercy, and for thy truth's sake.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，荣耀不要归与我们，不要归与我们。要因你的慈爱和诚实归在你的名下。

lineList.en: Wherefore should the heathen say, Where is now their God?
lineList.cn: 为何容外邦人说，他们的神在哪里呢。

lineList.en: But our God is in the heavens: he hath done whatsoever he hath pleased.
lineList.cn: 然而，我们的神在天上。都随自己的意旨行事。

lineList.en: Their idols are silver and gold, the work of men's hands.
lineList.cn: 他们的偶像，是金的，银的，是人手所造的。

lineList.en: They have mouths, but they speak not: eyes have they, but they see not:
lineList.cn: 有口却不能言，有眼却不能看。

lineList.en: They have ears, but they hear not: noses have they, but they smell not:
lineList.cn: 有耳却不能听。有鼻却不能闻。

lineList.en: They have hands, but they handle not: feet have they, but they walk not: neither speak they through their throat.
lineList.cn: 有手却不能摸。有脚却不能走。有喉咙也不能出声。

lineList.en: They that make them are like unto them; so is every one that trusteth in them.
lineList.cn: 造他的要和他一样。凡靠他的也要如此。

lineList.en: O Israel, trust thou in the LORD: he is their help and their shield.
lineList.cn: 以色列阿，你要倚靠耶和华。他是你的帮助，和你的盾牌。

lineList.en: O house of Aaron, trust in the LORD: he is their help and their shield.
lineList.cn: 亚伦家阿，你们要倚靠耶和华。他是你们的帮助，和你们的盾牌。

lineList.en: Ye that fear the LORD, trust in the LORD: he is their help and their shield.
lineList.cn: 你们敬畏耶和华的，要倚靠耶和华。他是你们的帮助，和你们的盾牌。

lineList.en: The LORD hath been mindful of us: he will bless us; he will bless the house of Israel; he will bless the house of Aaron.
lineList.cn: 耶和华向来眷念我们。他还要赐福给我们，要赐福给以色列的家，赐福给亚伦的家。

lineList.en: He will bless them that fear the LORD, both small and great.
lineList.cn: 凡敬畏耶和华的，无论大小，主必赐福给他。

lineList.en: The LORD shall increase you more and more, you and your children.
lineList.cn: 愿耶和华叫你们和你们的子孙，日见加增。

lineList.en: Ye are blessed of the LORD which made heaven and earth.
lineList.cn: 你们蒙了造天地之耶和华的福。

lineList.en: The heaven, even the heavens, are the LORD's: but the earth hath he given to the children of men.
lineList.cn: 天，是耶和华的天。地，他却给了世人。

lineList.en: The dead praise not the LORD, neither any that go down into silence.
lineList.cn: 死人不能赞美耶和华。下到寂静中的也都不能。

lineList.en: But we will bless the LORD from this time forth and for evermore. Praise the LORD.
lineList.cn: 但我们要称颂耶和华，从今时直到永远。你们要赞美耶和华。
